xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1004929-Desperate Souls, Dark City and the Legend of Midnight Cowboy 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1ActCe9sxmgVq67eH3pNHtBKtv0.jpg This is not a documentary about the making of Midnight Cowboy. It is about a dark and difficult masterpiece and the deeply gifted and flawed people who made it. It is about New York in a troubled era of cultural ferment and social change. It is about an era that made a movie and a movie that made an era. The 1969 movie tells the story of two homeless loners who join forces out of desperation and struggle to survive. Desperate Souls, Dark City and the Legend of Midnight Cowboy
